Patrick L. Taylor

p.taylor23@imperial.ac.uk

Mechanical Engineering

City & Guilds Building

Imperial College

I am a postdoctoral researcher working on using deep learning to improve in-situ defect detection in additive manufacturing in Paul Hooper’s group at Imperial College London. Before my current position at Imperial College, I completed a PhD in Physics at the University of Cambridge, where I was supervised by Gareth Conduit.

My research interests include materials informatics, alloy design, Bayesian machine learning, and deep learning for image processing.
